index.title: Hello world!
index.save-and-see-your-changes-instantly: Save and see your changes instantly.

index.heroDescription: Edit your images directly in your browser, no software download required

index.filterDescription: Apply stunning filters and effects to your photos
index.textDescription: Add text and stickers to your images

cloudSave.title: Cloud Saving
cloudSave.description: Save your editing history and projects after registration

multiDevice.title: Multi-Device Sync
multiDevice.description: Continue your editing on any device

advancedFilters.title: Advanced Filters
advancedFilters.description: Unique filter effects to make your photos stand out

howToStart.question: How do I start editing my first image?
howToStart.answer: Simply click the 'Start Editing' button, upload your image, and choose from our range of editing tools.

mobileUse.question: Can I use this tool on my mobile phone?
mobileUse.answer: Yes, our editor is fully responsive and works on all devices, including smartphones and tablets.

imageQuality.question: Will the quality of my image decrease after editing?
imageQuality.answer: We use advanced algorithms to maintain image quality. However, excessive editing may affect the final result.

freePaidDifference.question: What's the difference between the free and paid versions?
freePaidDifference.answer: The free version offers basic editing tools, while the paid version includes advanced features, cloud storage, and ad-free experience.

index.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who trust our tool for their image editing needs
